about_the_game:
Score points by taking control of the area, and the one with the most points wins.
Multiple groups of vehicles can be used to capture the area, the infantry can choose different arms, each arm can use some special weapons, through different combinations of arms to enhance the team's combat effectiveness, so that it is easier to capture the area
The game includes:
1:16 firearms including pistols, rifles, shotguns, snipers, missile launchers, and more
2:3 special weapons, hook lock explosion-proof shield reduced firing gun and some auxiliary props Medical props ammunition props gun accessories and so on
3:4 types of throwing weapons include grenades, flash bombs, smoke bombs, Molotov cocktails
4:8 types of vehicles, including two aerial vehicles, a tank, a special robot and some ordinary vehicles
5:5 maps include a training map+A large number of destructive elements
New content may be added later

name: RapidFire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Graphics: GTX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This is a FPS shooting battle type of game, using a variety of weapons and vehicles to combat the battlefield, enjoy the pleasure of scene destruction
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
